function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear regulations for protecting urban green spaces","Impact":"Risk of urban green spaces being exploited or destroyed","Mitigation":"Develop clear regulations and policies for the protection and promotion of urban green spaces","Technologies":"Policy development and urban planning tools","People":"Local citizens, communities","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, policy makers"},{"Description":"Lack of governance leading to severe socio-environmental problems","Impact":"Chaotic urban complex with severe socio-environmental problems","Mitigation":"Establish effective governance structures and regulations for urban green spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, governance frameworks","People":"Local citizens, communities","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, policy makers"},{"Description":"Community involvement in governance without clear coordination","Impact":"Potential lack of coordination and conflicts in decision-making","Mitigation":"Establish clear coordination mechanisms and communication channels for community involvement in governance","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication tools","People":"Local citizens, community organizations","Owner":"Local government, community leaders"}]}
